pr_title: Add thumbnail styles to the placeholder thumbnail

timeline.message: Add thumbnail styles to the placeholder thumbnail

timeline.bodyText: Rather than duplicating, why wouldn't we just put both thumbnail and placeholderThumbnail classes on the placeholder?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: Fixed! That makes much more sense.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused

timeline.message:
Revert "Add thumbnail styles to the placeholder thumbnail"

This reverts commit cf819c14ede3418752eddf67d1ba752d829af9aa.
Add elevation and rounding styles to placeholder thumbnails

timeline.bodyText: Just a query: Is it common to use MUI specific styles in className?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: This was the only way we were able to get it to inherit those styles without actually using Paper. And since Paper doesn't look right in this scenario, its a special case.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused
